name: Rhoptron Prime Syandana
description: Sumptuous details suit Parvos Granum's favored guardian.

languages.description: Prächtige Details passen zu Parvos Granums bevorzugtem Wächter.
languages.name: Rhoptron Prime Syandana

languages.description: De somptueux détails qui conviennent à la gardienne préférée de Parvos Granum.
languages.name: Syandana Rhoptron Prime

languages.description: Dettagli sontuosi adornano la guardiana preferita di Parvos Granum.
languages.name: Syandana Rhoptron Prime

languages.description: 파보스 그라넘이 아끼는 수호자에게 어울리는 호화로운 세부 양식이 돋보입니다.
languages.name: 로프트론 프라임 샨다나

languages.description: Suntuosos detalles adornan al guardián favorito de Parvos Granum.
languages.name: Syandana Rhoptron Prime

languages.description: 华丽的细节非常适合帕尔沃斯·格拉努最喜爱的守护者。
languages.name: 铃鼓 Prime 披饰

languages.description: Роскошный элемент наряда любимых защитников Парвоса Грэнума.
languages.name: Сандана: Роптрон Прайм

languages.description: Parvos Granumお気に入りの守護者に相応しい豪華な細部。
languages.name: Rhoptron Prime シャンダナ

languages.description: Wystawne detale pasują do ulubionego opiekuna Parvos Granum.
languages.name: Syandana Rhoptron Prime

languages.description: Detalhes suntuosos adornam a guardiã favorita de Parvos Granum.
languages.name: Syandana: Rhoptron Prime

languages.description: 華麗的細節非常適合 Parvos Granum 最受寵的守護者。
languages.name: 鈴鼓 Prime 披飾

languages.description: มีลวดลายหรูหราเหมาะกับผู้พิทักษ์คนโปรดของ Parvos Granum
languages.name: ไซอันดานา Rhoptron Prime

languages.description: Görkemli ayrıntılar Parvos Granum'un favori koruyucusuna çok yakışıyor.
languages.name: Rhoptron Prime Syandana

languages.description: Розкішний елемент вбрання найулюбленіших захисників Парва Ґранума.
languages.name: Сяндана «Роптрон-прайм»
